column4: hi there, i would like to install 64 bit ubuntu on my system. I know that my processor is a 64 bit processor, but ubuntu does not install (i am installing from boot using CD). what can i do?
I've seen some posts about some new motherboards that think they have a 32bit processor even with a 64bit proc installed
as I didn't see a solution I guess to get it to work was to install the 32bit version of ubuntu
ok, thank you for your help
